content:
There are many potential secrets that Chris and Anna could be hiding. Here are a few examples:

* They may have been responsible for the death of their own child before the apocalypse. This secret could be the reason why they feel uncomfortable around Edgar and Rachel, who have lost their own daughter.
* They could be former criminals or fugitives who are on the run from the law. This secret could be the reason why they are so secretive and why they are so eager to leave the bed and breakfast.
* They could be part of a group or a cult that has a different agenda and beliefs about how to survive the apocalypse. This secret could put them at odds with the main characters and create conflicts and tensions.
* They could be hiding a medical condition that makes them more vulnerable to the zombies, and they are afraid of being rejected by the main characters.
* They could have a hidden stash of supplies or weapons that they have been hiding from the main characters. This secret could be the reason why they are always in a hurry to leave and why they are unwilling to share their resources.

These are just a few examples of the kind of secrets that Chris and Anna could be hiding. The key is to make sure that whatever secret they're hiding is something that can drive the story forward and create conflicts and tensions between them and the main characters.
